text:
Hey guys, I'm new to HubSpot. 
My name is Esther, from Nigeria. I'm also known as Gestar

I'm currently putting my knowledge on digital marketing to practice,just created my website <http://www.thegestar.com|www.thegestar.com>

Will need y'all help.... I'm so excited to be you... Nice to meet y'all

Hello Guys,
I just want to know what is the good way to make the website using HubSpot CMS, is this necessary to make everything on module or we can use some static and some module.
because making website in module is time taking.

Hi Folks- I'm new in HS and need to create a template using drag and drop system and also bit coding (HTML&CSS) if required. Please tell how to start first or any training video available which can help with this?
